fields.name: Ice Unleashed (C1)
fields.value: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all opponents in its path.

fields.name: Atmospheric Revolution (C2)
fields.value: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.

fields.name: Cloudburst (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Frozen Skies (C4)
fields.value:
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by Cryo.
This effect can only occur once every 2s.

fields.name: The True Path (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the level of Spirit Blade - Chongyun's Layered Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Rally of Four Blades (C6)
fields.value:
Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.
